metadata.title: CVE-2021-33829 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the HTML Data Processor inCKEditor 4 4.14.0 through 4.16.x before 4.16.1 allows remote attackers toinject executable JavaScript code through a crafted comment because --!> ismishandled.

criterions.comment: ckeditor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
